Title: Malicious
Writer: Salvatore Samperi (story), Ottavio Jemma (screenplay), Salvatore Samperi (screenplay), Alessandro Parenzo (screenplay)
Actors: Laura Antonelli, Turi Ferro, Alessandro Momo, Tina Aumont
Plot: A widower and two of his sons become infatuated by their beautiful housekeeper, and all three set out to seduce her using their own unique methods.
